summary: The script implements a Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) training pipeline for reinforcement learning environments, utilizing Lightning Fabric to enable accelerated and distributed execution across multiple devices. It handles argument parsing, environment creation, agent initialization, training and evaluation loops, logging of metrics to TensorBoard, and optional video rendering.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, high‑performance framework for researchers and engineers to train PPO agents at scale, leveraging Lightning Fabric’s distributed capabilities to reduce training time and simplify deployment on CPU or GPU clusters.
